title: The 25 Best Deals from Nordstrom's Half-Yearly Sale
description: Score up to 60 percent off brands like Prada, Reformation, and more.
excerpt: Nordstrom just kicked off their winter Half-Yearly Sale. For a limited time, score up to 60 percent off brands like Prada, Reformation, and more.
text: Prada 55mm Irregular Sunglasses A designer pair of sunglasses will make any outfit. This is your chance to snag a timeless pair for more than half off.Reformation Reba Twill WaistcoatA Reformation sale is cause for celebration, but especially when the discounted item is as cute as this waistcoat. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowTom Ford Ébène Fumé Eau de Parfum & Travel Spray Gift SetIt’s a fact that Tom Ford makes some of the best fragrances out there. With smoky notes of Palo Santo, leather, and rose, this is a seductive fragrance to keep in your going-out purse.Mango Eliote Crop CardiganA classic striped cardigan can feel so effortlessly French. The gold button details on this version helps add a vintage-y twist.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowCharlotte Tilbury Iconic Hollywood Lipstick Trio Charlotte Tilbury makes the absolute best lipsticks, so if you’re waiting for a sign to try them out, this is it. In this limited edition set, you get three of her bestselling shades for a great price.Mother The Pixie Hustler High Waist Ankle Straight Leg JeansA new year means new denim. Say what you want about skinny jeans, but they’re poised for a comeback. This is the moment to finally get yourself an updated pair.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowNuFACE MINI+ Smart On-The-Go Facial Toning Starter Kit If your 2025 goals include having cheekbones that could cut glass, this NuFace device can make that a reality. Just five minutes a day improves facial contouring. Steve Madden Vinka BootieAdd a pop of color to any outfit with a cherry red boot. This one earns bonus points thanks to a comfortable stacked heel. No matter the temperature, they’ll pair well with a bikini or oversized coat.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowWestman Atelier The Summer Bronze Set Our summer bronze might be long-faded, but that’s exactly why we need to cheat our glow with this cream blush, highlighter, and illuminator set from clean beauty brand Westman Atelier. Viski 7-Piece Travel Barware SetDry January? Maybe next year. This bar kit has everything you need to make the best cocktails as we head into 2025.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowBernardo Faux Shearling Double Breasted Longline CoatTeddy coats are making a comeback, and this oversized option will keep you warm in even the most frigid conditions.NEST New York Grapefuit & Bamboo Reed Diffuser DuoThere is nothing better than when a houseguest compliments your space on its scent. This diffuser duo will help keep your home fresh.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowRocco Super Smart Beverage FridgeNothing is more elegant than having your own chic beverage fridge. Whether you fill it with expensive wines or cans of Coke Zero, this piece will become your pride and joy.Mulberry Pimlico High Gloss Leather ToteIf there’s one piece worth investing in, it’s a leather everyday bag that you can make your new work tote. With minimal branding and high-quality materials, this purse is well worth the money.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowT3 Featherweight StyleMax Hair DryerIf your hair goals for 2025 include not spending money at blowout bars anymore, you’ll need a good hair dryer. This one from T3 is one of the best–and lightest–on the market.Dermaflash DERMAPORE+ Ultrasonic Pore Extractor & Serum InfuserTired of blackheads and clogged pores? This handy tool uses vibrations to push out all the gunk that’s been sitting in your skin, so you can look fresher as we enter 2025.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowBirkenstock Arizona Big Buckle SandalsThese burnt-orange Birkenstocks will get so much wear in your wardrobe. Whether you use them in the summer or as a house shoe, there’s a reason why these never go out of style.Caraway Cookware SetIf you’re still using your pots from college, it might be time for an upgrade. Get four of Caraway’s must-have items for a great price.
html:
Prada 55mm Irregular Sunglasses

A designer pair of sunglasses will make any outfit. This is your chance to snag a timeless pair for more than half off.

Reformation Reba Twill Waistcoat

A Reformation sale is cause for celebration, but especially when the discounted item is as cute as this waistcoat.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Tom Ford Ébène Fumé Eau de Parfum & Travel Spray Gift Set

It’s a fact that Tom Ford makes some of the best fragrances out there. With smoky notes of Palo Santo, leather, and rose, this is a seductive fragrance to keep in your going-out purse.

Mango Eliote Crop Cardigan

A classic striped cardigan can feel so effortlessly French. The gold button details on this version helps add a vintage-y twist.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Charlotte Tilbury Iconic Hollywood Lipstick Trio

Charlotte Tilbury makes the absolute best lipsticks, so if you’re waiting for a sign to try them out, this is it. In this limited edition set, you get three of her bestselling shades for a great price.

Mother The Pixie Hustler High Waist Ankle Straight Leg Jeans

A new year means new denim. Say what you want about skinny jeans, but they’re poised for a comeback. This is the moment to finally get yourself an updated pair.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

NuFACE MINI+ Smart On-The-Go Facial Toning Starter Kit

If your 2025 goals include having cheekbones that could cut glass, this NuFace device can make that a reality. Just five minutes a day improves facial contouring.

Steve Madden Vinka Bootie

Add a pop of color to any outfit with a cherry red boot. This one earns bonus points thanks to a comfortable stacked heel.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Solawave 4-in-1 Radiant Renewal Skincare Wand

To get closer to your goal of having flawless skin, this handy tool uses light therapy to improve skin brightness and reduce blemishes.

Le Specs Outta Love Oval Sunglasses

These retro-inspired sunnies will add the perfect finishing touches to any outfit. No matter the temperature, they’ll pair well with a bikini or oversized coat.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Westman Atelier The Summer Bronze Set

Our summer bronze might be long-faded, but that’s exactly why we need to cheat our glow with this cream blush, highlighter, and illuminator set from clean beauty brand Westman Atelier.

Viski 7-Piece Travel Barware Set

Dry January? Maybe next year. This bar kit has everything you need to make the best cocktails as we head into 2025.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Bernardo Faux Shearling Double Breasted Longline Coat

Teddy coats are making a comeback, and this oversized option will keep you warm in even the most frigid conditions.

NEST New York Grapefuit & Bamboo Reed Diffuser Duo

There is nothing better than when a houseguest compliments your space on its scent. This diffuser duo will help keep your home fresh.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Rocco Super Smart Beverage Fridge

Nothing is more elegant than having your own chic beverage fridge. Whether you fill it with expensive wines or cans of Coke Zero, this piece will become your pride and joy.

Mulberry Pimlico High Gloss Leather Tote

If there’s one piece worth investing in, it’s a leather everyday bag that you can make your new work tote. With minimal branding and high-quality materials, this purse is well worth the money.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

T3 Featherweight StyleMax Hair Dryer

If your hair goals for 2025 include not spending money at blowout bars anymore, you’ll need a good hair dryer. This one from T3 is one of the best–and lightest–on the market.

Dermaflash DERMAPORE+ Ultrasonic Pore Extractor & Serum Infuser

Tired of blackheads and clogged pores? This handy tool uses vibrations to push out all the gunk that’s been sitting in your skin, so you can look fresher as we enter 2025.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Birkenstock Arizona Big Buckle Sandals

These burnt-orange Birkenstocks will get so much wear in your wardrobe. Whether you use them in the summer or as a house shoe, there’s a reason why these never go out of style.

Caraway Cookware Set

If you’re still using your pots from college, it might be time for an upgrade. Get four of Caraway’s must-have items for a great price.
